title: Google > Ring. Snapdragon > Apple A13. 2 Zooms > Zoom.
description: OnePlus has a concept phone coming to CES and Samsung has a Star Wars phone out now. The Snapdragon 865 finally beat its Apple counterpart - kinda. The New York Times investigated the location data obtained from a data mining company and it’s scary AF. Ring security is basically non-existent, and Google wants to climb into bed with them. And finally a smartphone is doing zoom right.  Recorded December 20, 2019 This podcast is sponsored by MNML Cases. Order a sweet, thin case for your phone and get 30% off. Use code DecktheHalls19 at checkout or click this link: https://mnmlcase.com/discount/Deckthehalls19 Topics Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Plus Star Wars Edition review Motorola Razr 2019: Price, release date, availability (Update: Delayed) Confirmed: OnePlus Concept One is a concept phone coming to CES 2020  Finally! Snapdragon 865's CPU beats the Apple A13 DGit Daily - 50 billion location data points leak for 12 million Americans, and more NYT - Opinion | Freaked Out? 3 Steps to Protect Your Phone Amazon Ring hack leads to privacy groups issuing a product warning Apple, Amazon, Google team up for smart home alliance Vivo steps up its camera game with the launch of Vivo X30 and X30 Pro The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Produced by Adam Doud Check out the other podcasts in our network! text: About the Podcast The Android Authority Podcast – discussing topics in Android every week. The Android Authority Podcast brings you all the top stories and features based on your favorite mobile operating system: Android. We help make Android more accessible to all, and dive deeper into the details when we can, there's something in here for everyone. Check out androidauthority.com for all the best news and reviews for your favorite phones and tablets, then join our community forums to join in on the discussion. Don't forget to hit our YouTube channel for even more.
html:
About the Podcast

The Android Authority Podcast – discussing topics in Android every week. The Android Authority Podcast brings you all the top stories and features based on your favorite mobile operating system: Android. We help make Android more accessible to all, and dive deeper into the details when we can, there's something in here for everyone. Check out androidauthority.com for all the best news and reviews for your favorite phones and tablets, then join our community forums to join in on the discussion. Don't forget to hit our YouTube channel for even more.
